name: Golorth Eats The World
description:
In this simple 1-4 player minigame your goal as a parasite is to get eaten up the food chain until you ultimately get eaten by the mighty creature: Golorth. Attempt to get a new record time over your friends, or punch each other away to get the last hit on Golorth's nest. 

This game is in early access and we hope to develop three more mini-games and release as a Golorth-themed pack.

NOTE: CONTROLLER SUPPORT ONLY!
